neighbors.name: G & D Properties LLC
neighbors.claims: G & D Properties LLC is a Wyoming limited liability company active since 2008 [Wyoming Secretary of State](https://wyobiz.wyo.gov/Business/FilingDetails.aspx?eFNum=241127022122024208155055022090029049015163105053). The entity's principal address is in Cokeville, WY, and its registered agent is Shawn Thornock [Wyoming Secretary of State](https://wyobiz.wyo.gov/Business/FilingDetails.aspx?eFNum=241127022122024208155055022090029049015163105053). The Thornock family is a long-standing local family in Cokeville; the previous registered agent, Gordon Thornock (deceased 2020), was a Cokeville School Board member and rodeo committee member [Matthews Mortuary](https://www.matthewsmortuaryidaho.com/obituary/Gordon-Thornock).
neighbors.influence_justification: Principals are members of the established Thornock family in Cokeville; Gordon Thornock held significant community roles (School Board, Rodeo Committee).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via Shawn Thornock (Registered Agent) at the Cokeville address. Acknowledge the family's long-standing community ties.

citations.claim: G & D Properties LLC is a Wyoming limited liability company active since 2008
citations.title: Wyoming Secretary of State Filing Details

citations.claim: The entity's principal address is in Cokeville, WY, and its registered agent is Shawn Thornock
citations.title: Wyoming Secretary of State Filing Details

citations.claim: Gordon Thornock (deceased 2020), was a Cokeville School Board member and rodeo committee member
citations.title: Obituary for Gordon Thornock

neighbors.name: Willis Land Wyoming LLC
neighbors.claims: Willis Land Wyoming LLC is a Wyoming LLC with a registered office in Cokeville, WY [Wyoming Secretary of State](https://wyobiz.wyo.gov/Business/FilingDetails.aspx?eFNum=032001058118174029224198032113143179231183021253). The registered agent is Jordon Willis, located in Cokeville, contradicting earlier assumptions of out-of-town ownership [Wyoming Secretary of State](https://wyobiz.wyo.gov/Business/FilingDetails.aspx?eFNum=032001058118174029224198032113143179231183021253). The Willis family is active in local agriculture, with related entities receiving agricultural subsidies in the area [EWG Farm Subsidy Database](https://farm.ewg.org/addrsearch.php?z=1&zip=83114&page=0).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local ownership confirmed (Jordon Willis, Cokeville); family has established agricultural presence in the area.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Jordon Willis directly in Cokeville. The entity is locally controlled, not an absentee investor.

citations.claim: Willis Land Wyoming LLC is a Wyoming LLC with a registered office in Cokeville, WY
citations.title: Wyoming Secretary of State Filing Details

citations.claim: The registered agent is Jordon Willis, located in Cokeville
citations.title: Wyoming Secretary of State Filing Details

citations.claim: related entities receiving agricultural subsidies in the area
citations.title: EWG Farm Subsidy Database Search Results 83114

neighbors.name: Putnam Ranch, LLP
neighbors.claims: Putnam Ranch, LLP is a Utah registered limited liability partnership that holds ranch land in Lincoln County [Lincoln County Records](http://weblink.lcwy.org/WebLink/DocView.aspx?id=302065&dbid=0&repo=LincolnCounty). The entity is managed by trustees Keith L. Putnam and Erma N. Putnam [Lincoln County Records](http://weblink.lcwy.org/WebLink/DocView.aspx?id=302065&dbid=0&repo=LincolnCounty). The Putnam family has significant water rights and agricultural operations in the neighboring Rich County, UT area [Utah Division of Water Rights](https://www.waterrights.utah.gov/canalinfo/canal_owners.asp).
neighbors.influence_justification: Established ranching family with significant land and water holdings across the WY/UT border; Keith Putnam has served in public roles in neighboring Rich County.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Putnam family directly; acknowledge their cross-border ranching operations and water rights interests.

citations.claim: Putnam Ranch, LLP is a Utah registered limited liability partnership that holds ranch land in Lincoln County
citations.title: Lincoln County Clerk Records - Assignment of Mortgage

citations.claim: The entity is managed by trustees Keith L. Putnam and Erma N. Putnam
citations.title: Lincoln County Clerk Records - Assignment of Mortgage

citations.claim: The Putnam family has significant water rights and agricultural operations in the neighboring Rich County, UT area
citations.title: Utah Division of Water Rights - Canal Owners

neighbors.name: Pope Cattle Refuge LLC
neighbors.claims: Pope Cattle Refuge LLC is a Wyoming LLC formed in 2013 by Evan H. and Dotty Jo Pope of Cokeville [Lincoln County Records](https://weblink.lcwy.org/WebLink/DocView.aspx?id=281734&dbid=0&repo=LincolnCounty). The Pope family is deeply embedded in the local community; Shane Pope serves as the Cokeville Public Works Director [Town of Cokeville](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_62983/File/City%20Manager's%20Office/Info%20Packets/01%2001.08.21%20IP%20packet%20(R).pdf). Shane Pope has previously attended meetings with Rocky Mountain Power regarding solar development in the region [Lincoln County Economic Development Board](https://cms5.revize.com/revize/lincoln/Document_center/Agenda%20&%20Minutes/Economic%20Development/2019/Minutes/3.4.19%20ED%20Minutes.pdf).
neighbors.influence_justification: Multi-generation ranching family with direct municipal leadership role (Shane Pope is Public Works Director).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via Shane Pope given his municipal role and prior attendance at renewable energy meetings; emphasize coexistence with ranching operations.

citations.claim: Pope Cattle Refuge LLC is a Wyoming LLC formed in 2013 by Evan H. and Dotty Jo Pope of Cokeville
citations.title: Lincoln County Clerk Records - Quitclaim Deed

citations.claim: Shane Pope serves as the Cokeville Public Works Director
citations.title: Casper City Manager's Office Info Packet (citing WAM Directory)

citations.claim: Shane Pope has previously attended meetings with Rocky Mountain Power regarding solar development in the region
citations.title: Lincoln County Economic Development Board Minutes
